程序包 org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.hint

类 HintManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.hint.HintManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AutoCloseable
    public final class HintManager
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    The manager that use hint to inject sharding key directly through ThreadLocal.
